name: Salad with Warm Herb & Garlic Dressing
description: This simple green salad can be assembled and stored, covered, in the fridge. Add dressing immediately before serving.

ingredients.name: Boston lettuce, or 6 cups baby spinach leaves
Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
Herbed Garlic Sea Salt Blend or sea salt

preparation: Place lettuce in serving bowl. Top with red pepper.
Whisk together oil, vinegar and dip mix. Season with salt and pepper.
Quickly warm in a small saucepan or in the microwave.
Drizzle over salad and toss quickly to coat. Sprinkle Parmesan overtop and serve immediately.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and a dinner roll.
